import styleCss from "./style.module.css"; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { API } from '../config/api' import { useContext, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; function HomeSubscribe() { const [book, setBook] = useState([]); const navigate = useNavigate() const handleClick = () => { navigate("/profile") } const subscribe = useNavigate() const Click = () => { subscribe("/subscribe") } const out = useNavigate() const push = () => { out("/") } const detail = useNavigate() const kirim = () => { detail("/bookdetail") } const home = useNavigate() const arah = () => { home("/homesub") } return (
